00008 SettingsManager::SettingsManager()
00009 {
00010         this->loaded = false;
00011 
00012         ifstream ngene_conf ("ngene.conf");
00013         if (ngene_conf.is_open())
00014         {
00015                 this->config.module_path = vector<string> (number_of_modules);
00016                 this->config.parameters = vector<string> (number_of_modules);
00017 
00018                 string line;
00019                 getline(ngene_conf, line);      // first line is a comment, telling a nosy user not to mess with the file too much
00020 
00021                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00022                 this->config.adult_pool_capacity = atoi(line.c_str());
00023 
00024                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00025                 this->config.doomsday = atoi(line.c_str());
00026 
00027                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00028                 if (line.compare(0, 4, "true") == 0)
00029                         this->config.elitism = true;
00030                 else
00031                         this->config.elitism = false;
00032 
00033                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00034                 this->config.lifespan = atoi(line.c_str());

00037                 this->config.mating_rate = atof(line.c_str());
00038 
00039                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00040                 this->config.max_prodigies = atoi(line.c_str()) + 1;
00041 
00042                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00043                 this->config.mutation_rate = atof(line.c_str());
00044 
00045                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00046                 this->config.offspring_rate = atoi(line.c_str());

00048                 getline(ngene_conf, line);
00049                 getline(ngene_conf, line);      // gene module
00050                 getline(ngene_conf, this->config.module_path[gene_module]);
00051                 trim(this->config.module_path[gene_module]);
00052                 getline(ngene_conf, this->config.parameters[gene_module]);
00053                 trim(this->config.parameters[gene_module]);

00056                 getline(ngene_conf, line);      // fitness module

00060                 trim(this->config.parameters[fitness_module]);
